artifact_type.description: AWO artifact type identifier for this schema.

run_id.description: Stable identifier for the governed workflow run.

awo_version.description: Declared AWO method version used for this run (e.g. '2.0.0').

created_at.description: ISO8601 timestamp when this artifact was created.

created_by.description: Identifier for the actor (human or agent) that created this artifact.

in_scope.description: Explicitly in-scope questions, tasks, or subsystems.

out_of_scope.description: Explicitly out-of-scope questions, tasks, or subsystems.

dependencies.description: Known external dependencies or upstream artifacts.
